fact.headline: I may not go to school again
paragraphs: “The principal announced the vacations but did not mention the date the school was to reopen. This was the first time this has happened.
The principal did not inform us about the reason behind not announcing the school reopening, but my guess was that the Taleban had announced a ban on girls' education from 15 January.

Since today was the last day of our school, we decided to play in the playground a bit longer. I am of the view that the school will one day reopen but while leaving I looked at the building as if I would not come here again.”
